a1: The galacticos Real Madrid are one of the biggest teams in the world, I respect them.
q2: Do you think that Real Madrid will win the champions league this year?
a2: Yes I think it is likely
q3: Do they make apple pie in Real Madrid?
a3: I'm not sure but I could do it
q4: Is it the best team of all time?
a4: More than likely. They hold more cup titles than anyone.
q5: If they win the champions league this year, I would not be so shocked about it.
a5: Does Real Madrid have any close rivals?
